synthesis_conditions.equipment: small vial within a larger vial
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with 3 × 10 mL of absolute ethanol
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The compound is insoluble in water and common organic solvents such as ethanol, acetonitrile, chloroform, tetrahydrofuran, acetone, and N,N-dimethylformamide.

synthesis_conditions.description: Crystalline samples of freshly isolated and pure Zn2(BTC)(NO3)·(H2O)(C2H5OH)5 were subjected to a dinitrogen stream at room temperature for 1 day to yield the desired product.
Large transparent colorless crystals of nearly 0.2 × 0.2 × 0.2 mm size of the unevacuated parent solid were immersed in N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF) for 5−15 min at room temperature and then filtered.
